title: HOW TO ACUALLY KILL TEEMO AND SURVIVE?
body: In a few matches i have battle against Teemo a few times but it seems Teemo {{champion:17}} is the most harder champion to kill. Teemo run fast , when you chase {{champion:17}} you got poison by Teemo's mushrooms and you must fall back. If there is any tips that can help me easier to kill Teemo pls tell me thx...

replies.body:
You're gonna enjoy him next patch ;)

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/07/723-pbe-update.html (scroll near the bottom of the page)

His not that hard, but it depends on what you have available.

Rule 1: level 9 = upgraded sweeper or pink trinket.
Rule 2: know your openings (Teemo's blind is on an 8 second CD, if your AA based, you have 6 seconds to kick the shit through him)
Rule 3: Be smart about your pathing, teemo shrooms don't get placed everywhere, therefore knowing where the mushrooms are likely placed and avoiding them means you can keep chasing.
Rule 4: Either choose to fight him in sustained fights, or in bursts, but don't let him choose, base it off what you want (this is heavily dependant on your champion).

The only thing you can do currently to help with the mushrooms is you and your team placing pink wards so that you can see them. Apart from that, try not to 1v1 teemo at early levels, as his poison really hurts at this time. Hope this helps!

assasins 

i have managed to kill teemo with {{champion:86}}  lmao

It's like Trying to Run or Chase {{champion:76}}  or {{champion:121}} 
it's just not possible... You can't run from them or catch them
